description: Erik Hakkinen's Daiquiri D'ananas, made with pineapple liqueur, is quickly becoming one of Seattle's favorite daiquiris. Each ingredient is perfectly balanced, but the pineapple liqueur stands out.
name: Daiquiri D’ananas
recipeIngredient: 1 ½ oz. Unaged rhum agricole or Aged rhum agricole

recipeInstructions.name: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail or coupe glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail or coupe glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Serve with a lime wheel as a garnish.
recipeInstructions.text: Serve with a lime wheel as a garnish.
